item.description:
Blithe Spirit - Trinity Brewhouse Meetup

Come see Blithe Spirit at Trinity Rep and then meet afterward at Trinity Brewhouse.

8 pm -- Blithe Spirit, hilarious comedy by Noel Coward at Trinity Repertory Company, 201 Washington St., Providence, RI, 401.351.4242.

**Buy a ticket for yourself, or post a note on the Message Board to find others to go with you. There were a few $20 seats left, and if you want to go really budget, you can sit on the bench for $10. The bench is general admission.

10:30 pm -- Gather afterward at Trinity Brewhouse, just behind the theatre. They serve food and beer, and they're open til 2 a.m. on Saturdays. This is not meant to be a serious discussion of the play, just a chance to socialize afterward!

(I'll post more details later on how to find us at the brewhouse).

Even if you can't make the play, come join us to meet others in the group! Please RSVP if possible, so we can try to reserve a table. But if you want to just show up, that's fine, too.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask at the hostess stand for the theatre group. We'll try to get a table, but even if it's too crowded to sit, I'll let the host/hostess know where we are.
item.why: Come see Blithe Spirit, a hilarious comedy at Trinity Rep -- and then join us afterward for drinks, dessert or whatever at Trinity Brewhouse, just behind the theatre. Or if you can't make the show, join us anyway and meet other members!
item.name: Blithe Spirit - Trinity Brewhouse Meetup
